entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
